description: Incomplete. Contains also fragments from Baḥya ben Joseph ibn Paḳuda's Al-Hidāja ʼilā farāʼid al-qulūb (The book of direction to the duties of the heart) together with an extract from a homily by a different author and  a liturgy by Levi ben Moses.
title: Sefer Malmad ha-Talmidim
author: Anatoli, Jacob ben Abba Mari ben Samson
